overview: It's near the 21st century, and the Devil wants to com out and play. He's been stuck with the same women in Hell for thousands of years and he's bored! He's ready for some mortal babes. There's only one problem, 5 "Special" women must be sacrificed before he can get to the real world
tagline: He's been stuck with the same women in Hell for thousands of years and he's bored
title: Hell's Belles
